C

calc.controller - package calc.controller
 
calc.model - package calc.model
 
calc.model.visitor - package calc.model.visitor
 
calc.view - package calc.view
 
CalcController - Class in calc.controller
The controller class determines the communication between an instance of CalcModel and CalcView, namely the inputs to be evaluated and and outputs to be displayed.
CalcController(CalcModel, ViewInterface) - Constructor for class calc.controller.CalcController
Constructs an object of CalcModel, passing it's update runnables to the observable view methods.
CalcInterface - Interface in calc.model
This interface is implemented by RevPolishCalc and StandardCalc, instructing them to implement an evaluate method.
CalcModel - Class in calc.model
Evaluates expressions passed by the controller, so the controller can pass the answer back to the view.
CalcModel() - Constructor for class calc.model.CalcModel
Constructs an object of CalcModel, initialising the two calculator objects, and setting current to StandardCalc.
convertToPostfix(StrStack) - Method in class calc.model.StandardCalc
This method uses Dijkstra's Shunting Algorithm to convert an infix expression to a post expression.
createView() - Static method in class calc.controller.ViewFactory
This is the factory method which decides which type of view instance to return, depending on whether the application has been run through the command line.
current - Variable in class calc.model.CalcModel
